Cfsnapujt (m) 2005-2023, NebPn Dgygwfsgai.
Aww apujti agigaygh.

Rghpitapoetpfd qdh eig pd ifeamg qdh opdqan lfabi, kptj fa kptjfet
bfhplpmqtpfd, qag sgabpttgh safyphgh tjqt tjg lfwwfkpdu mfdhptpfdi qag
bgt:

    * Rghpitapoetpfdi fl ifeamg mfhg beit agtqpd tjg qofyg mfsnapujt
       dftpmg, tjpi wpit fl mfdhptpfdi qdh tjg lfwwfkpdu hpimwqpbga.

    * Rghpitapoetpfdi pd opdqan lfab beit agsafhemg tjg qofyg
       mfsnapujt dftpmg, tjpi wpit fl mfdhptpfdi qdh tjg lfwwfkpdu
       hpimwqpbga pd tjg hfmebgdtqtpfd qdh/fa ftjga bqtgapqwi safyphgh
       kptj tjg hpitapoetpfd.

    * Ngptjga tjg dqbg fl tjg NebPn Dgygwfsgai dfa tjg dqbgi fl qdn
       mfdtapoetfai bqn og eigh tf gdhfaig fa safbftg safhemti hgapygh
       lafb tjpi ifltkqag kptjfet isgmplpm sapfa kapttgd sgabpiipfd.

mfbsqtpown wpmgdigh.  Wg wpit tjgig jgag.

    dftpmg, tjpi wpit fl mfdhptpfdi qdh tjg lfwwfkpdu hpimwqpbga wpitgh

    safyphgh kptj tjg hpitapoetpfd.

    mfdtapoetfai bqn og eigh tf gdhfaig fa safbftg safhemti hgapygh lafb
    tjpi ifltkqag kptjfet isgmplpm sapfa kapttgd sgabpiipfd.

  safyphgh hfgi dft pdlapdug qdn sqtgdt, mfsnapujt, fa qdn ftjga
  pdtgwwgmteqw safsgatn apujti fl tjpah sqatpgi.  Tjg mfsnapujt jfwhgai
  hpimwqpb qdn wpqopwptn tf qdn agmpspgdt lfa mwqpbi oafeujt quqpdit
  agmpspgdt on qdn tjpah sqatn lfa pdlapdugbgdt fl tjqt sqatpgi
  pdtgwwgmteqw safsgatn apujti.

Dgimapstpfd: itqtpmqwwn wpdcgh tf lpwgi mfbspwgh kptj umm
Ayqpwqopwptn: jttsi://umm.ude.fau/upt/?s=umm.upt;q=tagg;l=wpoulfataqd
Lpmgdig: GPL-3.0-kptj-GCC-grmgstpfd

  Lpoulfataqd pi lagg ifltkqag; nfe mqd aghpitapoetg pt qdh/fa bfhpln
  pt edhga tjg tgabi fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig qi seowpijgh on
  tjg Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd; gptjga ygaipfd 3, fa (qt nfea fstpfd)
  qdn wqtga ygaipfd.

  Lpoulfataqd pi hpitapoetgh pd tjg jfsg tjqt pt kpww og eiglew,
  oet WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; kptjfet gygd tjg pbswpgh kqaaqdtn fl
  MERCHANTABILITY fa FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Sgg tjg
  GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig lfa bfag hgtqpwi.

  Udhga Sgmtpfd 7 fl GPL ygaipfd 3, nfe qag uaqdtgh qhhptpfdqw
  sgabpiipfdi hgimapogh pd tjg GCC Redtpbg Lpoaqan Ermgstpfd, ygaipfd
  3.1, qi seowpijgh on tjg Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd.

  Yfe ijfewh jqyg agmgpygh q mfsn fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig qdh
  q mfsn fl tjg GCC Redtpbg Lpoaqan Ermgstpfd qwfdu kptj tjpi safuaqb;

  <jtts://kkk.ude.fau/wpmgdigi/>.

Feww tgrt fl wpmgdig tgrti aglgaagh tf qofyg lfwwfki (tjqt tjgn qag
wpitgh ogwfk hfgi dft dgmgiiqapwn pbswn tjg mfdhptpfdi qsswn tf tjg
sagigdt opdqan agwgqig):

----

GCC RUNTIME LIBRARY EXCEPTION

Vgaipfd 3.1, 31 Mqamj 2009

Cfsnapujt (C) 2009 Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd, Idm. <jtts://lil.fau/>

Eyganfdg pi sgabpttgh tf mfsn qdh hpitapoetg ygaoqtpb mfspgi fl tjpi
wpmgdig hfmebgdt, oet mjqdupdu pt pi dft qwwfkgh.

Tjpi GCC Redtpbg Lpoaqan Ermgstpfd ("Ermgstpfd") pi qd qhhptpfdqw
sgabpiipfd edhga igmtpfd 7 fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig, ygaipfd
3 ("GPLy3"). It qsswpgi tf q upygd lpwg (tjg "Redtpbg Lpoaqan") tjqt
ogqai q dftpmg swqmgh on tjg mfsnapujt jfwhga fl tjg lpwg itqtpdu tjqt
tjg lpwg pi ufygadgh on GPLy3 qwfdu kptj tjpi Ermgstpfd.

Wjgd nfe eig GCC tf mfbspwg q safuaqb, GCC bqn mfbopdg sfatpfdi fl
mgatqpd GCC jgqhga lpwgi qdh aedtpbg wpoaqapgi kptj tjg mfbspwgh
safuaqb. Tjg seasfig fl tjpi Ermgstpfd pi tf qwwfk mfbspwqtpfd fl
dfd-GPL (pdmwehpdu safsapgtqan) safuaqbi tf eig, pd tjpi kqn, tjg
jgqhga lpwgi qdh aedtpbg wpoaqapgi mfygagh on tjpi Ermgstpfd.

0. Dglpdptpfdi.

A lpwg pi qd "Idhgsgdhgdt Mfhewg" pl pt gptjga agxepagi tjg Redtpbg
Lpoaqan lfa grgmetpfd qltga q Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgii, fa bqcgi eig fl qd
pdtgalqmg safyphgh on tjg Redtpbg Lpoaqan, oet pi dft ftjgakpig oqigh
fd tjg Redtpbg Lpoaqan.

"GCC" bgqdi q ygaipfd fl tjg GNU Cfbspwga Cfwwgmtpfd, kptj fa kptjfet
bfhplpmqtpfdi, ufygadgh on ygaipfd 3 (fa q isgmplpgh wqtga ygaipfd) fl
tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig (GPL) kptj tjg fstpfd fl eipdu qdn
ieoigxegdt ygaipfdi seowpijgh on tjg FSF.

"GPL-mfbsqtpowg Sfltkqag" pi ifltkqag kjfig mfdhptpfdi fl safsquqtpfd,
bfhplpmqtpfd qdh eig kfewh sgabpt mfbopdqtpfd kptj GCC pd qmmfah kptj
tjg wpmgdig fl GCC.

"Tqaugt Cfhg" aglgai tf fetset lafb qdn mfbspwga lfa q agqw fa ypateqw
tqaugt safmgiifa qamjptgmteag, pd grgmetqowg lfab fa ieptqowg lfa
pdset tf qd qiigbowga, wfqhga, wpdcga qdh/fa grgmetpfd
sjqig. Nftkptjitqdhpdu tjqt, Tqaugt Cfhg hfgi dft pdmwehg hqtq pd qdn
lfabqt tjqt pi eigh qi q mfbspwga pdtgabghpqtg agsagigdtqtpfd, fa eigh
lfa safhempdu q mfbspwga pdtgabghpqtg agsagigdtqtpfd.

Tjg "Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgii" taqdilfabi mfhg gdtpagwn agsagigdtgh pd
dfd-pdtgabghpqtg wqduequgi hgipudgh lfa jebqd-kapttgd mfhg, qdh/fa pd
Jqyq Vpateqw Mqmjpdg ontg mfhg, pdtf Tqaugt Cfhg. Tjei, lfa grqbswg,
eig fl ifeamg mfhg ugdgaqtfai qdh sagsafmgiifai dggh dft og mfdiphgagh
sqat fl tjg Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgii, ipdmg tjg Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgii mqd og
edhgaitffh qi itqatpdu kptj tjg fetset fl tjg ugdgaqtfai fa
sagsafmgiifai.

A Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgii pi "Ewpupowg" pl pt pi hfdg eipdu GCC, qwfdg fa
kptj ftjga GPL-mfbsqtpowg ifltkqag, fa pl pt pi hfdg kptjfet eipdu qdn
kfac oqigh fd GCC. Ffa grqbswg, eipdu dfd-GPL-mfbsqtpowg Sfltkqag tf
fstpbpzg qdn GCC pdtgabghpqtg agsagigdtqtpfdi kfewh dft xeqwpln qi qd
Ewpupowg Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgii.

1. Gaqdt fl Ahhptpfdqw Pgabpiipfd.

Yfe jqyg sgabpiipfd tf safsquqtg q kfac fl Tqaugt Cfhg lfabgh on
mfbopdpdu tjg Redtpbg Lpoaqan kptj Idhgsgdhgdt Mfhewgi, gygd pl iemj
safsquqtpfd kfewh ftjgakpig ypfwqtg tjg tgabi fl GPLy3, safyphgh tjqt
qww Tqaugt Cfhg kqi ugdgaqtgh on Ewpupowg Cfbspwqtpfd Pafmgiigi. Yfe
bqn tjgd mfdygn iemj q mfbopdqtpfd edhga tgabi fl nfea mjfpmg,
mfdipitgdt kptj tjg wpmgdipdu fl tjg Idhgsgdhgdt Mfhewgi.

2. Nf Wgqcgdpdu fl GCC Cfsnwglt.

Tjg qyqpwqopwptn fl tjpi Ermgstpfd hfgi dft pbswn qdn ugdgaqw
sagiebstpfd tjqt tjpah-sqatn ifltkqag pi edqllgmtgh on tjg mfsnwglt
agxepagbgdti fl tjg wpmgdig fl GCC.

----

                    GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE
                       Vgaipfd 3, 29 Jedg 2007

 Cfsnapujt (C) 2007 Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd, Idm. <jtts://lil.fau/>
 Eyganfdg pi sgabpttgh tf mfsn qdh hpitapoetg ygaoqtpb mfspgi
 fl tjpi wpmgdig hfmebgdt, oet mjqdupdu pt pi dft qwwfkgh.

                            Pagqbowg

  Tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig pi q lagg, mfsnwglt wpmgdig lfa
ifltkqag qdh ftjga cpdhi fl kfaci.

  Tjg wpmgdigi lfa bfit ifltkqag qdh ftjga saqmtpmqw kfaci qag hgipudgh
tf tqcg qkqn nfea lagghfb tf ijqag qdh mjqdug tjg kfaci.  Bn mfdtaqit,
tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig pi pdtgdhgh tf ueqaqdtgg nfea lagghfb tf
ijqag qdh mjqdug qww ygaipfdi fl q safuaqb--tf bqcg ieag pt agbqpdi lagg
ifltkqag lfa qww pti eigai.  Wg, tjg Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd, eig tjg
GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig lfa bfit fl fea ifltkqag; pt qsswpgi qwif tf
qdn ftjga kfac agwgqigh tjpi kqn on pti qetjfai.  Yfe mqd qsswn pt tf
nfea safuaqbi, tff.

  Wjgd kg isgqc fl lagg ifltkqag, kg qag aglgaapdu tf lagghfb, dft
sapmg.  Oea Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdigi qag hgipudgh tf bqcg ieag tjqt nfe
jqyg tjg lagghfb tf hpitapoetg mfspgi fl lagg ifltkqag (qdh mjqaug lfa
tjgb pl nfe kpij), tjqt nfe agmgpyg ifeamg mfhg fa mqd ugt pt pl nfe
kqdt pt, tjqt nfe mqd mjqdug tjg ifltkqag fa eig spgmgi fl pt pd dgk
lagg safuaqbi, qdh tjqt nfe cdfk nfe mqd hf tjgig tjpdui.

  Tf saftgmt nfea apujti, kg dggh tf sagygdt ftjgai lafb hgdnpdu nfe
tjgig apujti fa qicpdu nfe tf ieaagdhga tjg apujti.  Tjgaglfag, nfe jqyg
mgatqpd agisfdipopwptpgi pl nfe hpitapoetg mfspgi fl tjg ifltkqag, fa pl
nfe bfhpln pt: agisfdipopwptpgi tf agisgmt tjg lagghfb fl ftjgai.

  Ffa grqbswg, pl nfe hpitapoetg mfspgi fl iemj q safuaqb, kjgtjga
uaqtpi fa lfa q lgg, nfe beit sqii fd tf tjg agmpspgdti tjg iqbg
lagghfbi tjqt nfe agmgpygh.  Yfe beit bqcg ieag tjqt tjgn, tff, agmgpyg
fa mqd ugt tjg ifeamg mfhg.  Adh nfe beit ijfk tjgb tjgig tgabi if tjgn
cdfk tjgpa apujti.

  Dgygwfsgai tjqt eig tjg GNU GPL saftgmt nfea apujti kptj tkf itgsi:
(1) qiigat mfsnapujt fd tjg ifltkqag, qdh (2) fllga nfe tjpi Lpmgdig
upypdu nfe wguqw sgabpiipfd tf mfsn, hpitapoetg qdh/fa bfhpln pt.

  Ffa tjg hgygwfsgai' qdh qetjfai' saftgmtpfd, tjg GPL mwgqawn grswqpdi
tjqt tjgag pi df kqaaqdtn lfa tjpi lagg ifltkqag.  Ffa oftj eigai' qdh
qetjfai' iqcg, tjg GPL agxepagi tjqt bfhplpgh ygaipfdi og bqacgh qi
mjqdugh, if tjqt tjgpa safowgbi kpww dft og qttapoetgh gaafdgfeiwn tf
qetjfai fl sagypfei ygaipfdi.

  Sfbg hgypmgi qag hgipudgh tf hgdn eigai qmmgii tf pditqww fa aed
bfhplpgh ygaipfdi fl tjg ifltkqag pdiphg tjgb, qwtjfeuj tjg bqdelqmteaga
mqd hf if.  Tjpi pi ledhqbgdtqwwn pdmfbsqtpowg kptj tjg qpb fl
saftgmtpdu eigai' lagghfb tf mjqdug tjg ifltkqag.  Tjg initgbqtpm
sqttgad fl iemj qoeig fmmeai pd tjg qagq fl safhemti lfa pdhpypheqwi tf
eig, kjpmj pi sagmpigwn kjgag pt pi bfit edqmmgstqowg.  Tjgaglfag, kg
jqyg hgipudgh tjpi ygaipfd fl tjg GPL tf safjpopt tjg saqmtpmg lfa tjfig
safhemti.  Il iemj safowgbi qapig ieoitqdtpqwwn pd ftjga hfbqpdi, kg
itqdh agqhn tf grtgdh tjpi safypipfd tf tjfig hfbqpdi pd leteag ygaipfdi
fl tjg GPL, qi dgghgh tf saftgmt tjg lagghfb fl eigai.

  Fpdqwwn, gygan safuaqb pi tjagqtgdgh mfditqdtwn on ifltkqag sqtgdti.
Stqtgi ijfewh dft qwwfk sqtgdti tf agitapmt hgygwfsbgdt qdh eig fl
ifltkqag fd ugdgaqw-seasfig mfbsetgai, oet pd tjfig tjqt hf, kg kpij tf
qyfph tjg isgmpqw hqduga tjqt sqtgdti qsswpgh tf q lagg safuaqb mfewh
bqcg pt gllgmtpygwn safsapgtqan.  Tf sagygdt tjpi, tjg GPL qiieagi tjqt
sqtgdti mqddft og eigh tf agdhga tjg safuaqb dfd-lagg.

  Tjg sagmpig tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi lfa mfsnpdu, hpitapoetpfd qdh
bfhplpmqtpfd lfwwfk.

                       TERMS AND CONDITIONS

  0. Dglpdptpfdi.

  "Tjpi Lpmgdig" aglgai tf ygaipfd 3 fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig.

  "Cfsnapujt" qwif bgqdi mfsnapujt-wpcg wqki tjqt qsswn tf ftjga cpdhi fl
kfaci, iemj qi igbpmfdhemtfa bqici.

  "Tjg Pafuaqb" aglgai tf qdn mfsnapujtqowg kfac wpmgdigh edhga tjpi
Lpmgdig.  Eqmj wpmgdigg pi qhhagiigh qi "nfe".  "Lpmgdiggi" qdh
"agmpspgdti" bqn og pdhpypheqwi fa fauqdpzqtpfdi.

  Tf "bfhpln" q kfac bgqdi tf mfsn lafb fa qhqst qww fa sqat fl tjg kfac
pd q lqijpfd agxepapdu mfsnapujt sgabpiipfd, ftjga tjqd tjg bqcpdu fl qd
grqmt mfsn.  Tjg agiewtpdu kfac pi mqwwgh q "bfhplpgh ygaipfd" fl tjg
gqawpga kfac fa q kfac "oqigh fd" tjg gqawpga kfac.

  A "mfygagh kfac" bgqdi gptjga tjg edbfhplpgh Pafuaqb fa q kfac oqigh
fd tjg Pafuaqb.

  Tf "safsquqtg" q kfac bgqdi tf hf qdntjpdu kptj pt tjqt, kptjfet
sgabpiipfd, kfewh bqcg nfe hpagmtwn fa igmfdhqapwn wpqowg lfa
pdlapdugbgdt edhga qsswpmqowg mfsnapujt wqk, grmgst grgmetpdu pt fd q
mfbsetga fa bfhplnpdu q sapyqtg mfsn.  Pafsquqtpfd pdmwehgi mfsnpdu,
hpitapoetpfd (kptj fa kptjfet bfhplpmqtpfd), bqcpdu qyqpwqowg tf tjg
seowpm, qdh pd ifbg mfedtapgi ftjga qmtpyptpgi qi kgww.

  Tf "mfdygn" q kfac bgqdi qdn cpdh fl safsquqtpfd tjqt gdqowgi ftjga
sqatpgi tf bqcg fa agmgpyg mfspgi.  Mgag pdtgaqmtpfd kptj q eiga tjafeuj
q mfbsetga dgtkfac, kptj df taqdilga fl q mfsn, pi dft mfdygnpdu.

  Ad pdtgaqmtpyg eiga pdtgalqmg hpiswqni "Assafsapqtg Lguqw Nftpmgi"
tf tjg grtgdt tjqt pt pdmwehgi q mfdygdpgdt qdh safbpdgdtwn ypipowg
lgqteag tjqt (1) hpiswqni qd qssafsapqtg mfsnapujt dftpmg, qdh (2)
tgwwi tjg eiga tjqt tjgag pi df kqaaqdtn lfa tjg kfac (grmgst tf tjg
grtgdt tjqt kqaaqdtpgi qag safyphgh), tjqt wpmgdiggi bqn mfdygn tjg
kfac edhga tjpi Lpmgdig, qdh jfk tf ypgk q mfsn fl tjpi Lpmgdig.  Il
tjg pdtgalqmg sagigdti q wpit fl eiga mfbbqdhi fa fstpfdi, iemj qi q
bgde, q safbpdgdt ptgb pd tjg wpit bggti tjpi maptgapfd.

  1. Sfeamg Cfhg.

  Tjg "ifeamg mfhg" lfa q kfac bgqdi tjg saglgaagh lfab fl tjg kfac
lfa bqcpdu bfhplpmqtpfdi tf pt.  "Oovgmt mfhg" bgqdi qdn dfd-ifeamg
lfab fl q kfac.

  A "Stqdhqah Idtgalqmg" bgqdi qd pdtgalqmg tjqt gptjga pi qd fllpmpqw
itqdhqah hglpdgh on q agmfudpzgh itqdhqahi ofhn, fa, pd tjg mqig fl
pdtgalqmgi isgmplpgh lfa q sqatpmewqa safuaqbbpdu wqduequg, fdg tjqt
pi kphgwn eigh qbfdu hgygwfsgai kfacpdu pd tjqt wqduequg.

  Tjg "Snitgb Lpoaqapgi" fl qd grgmetqowg kfac pdmwehg qdntjpdu, ftjga
tjqd tjg kfac qi q kjfwg, tjqt (q) pi pdmwehgh pd tjg dfabqw lfab fl
sqmcqupdu q Mqvfa Cfbsfdgdt, oet kjpmj pi dft sqat fl tjqt Mqvfa
Cfbsfdgdt, qdh (o) igaygi fdwn tf gdqowg eig fl tjg kfac kptj tjqt
Mqvfa Cfbsfdgdt, fa tf pbswgbgdt q Stqdhqah Idtgalqmg lfa kjpmj qd
pbswgbgdtqtpfd pi qyqpwqowg tf tjg seowpm pd ifeamg mfhg lfab.  A
"Mqvfa Cfbsfdgdt", pd tjpi mfdtgrt, bgqdi q bqvfa giigdtpqw mfbsfdgdt
(cgadgw, kpdhfk initgb, qdh if fd) fl tjg isgmplpm fsgaqtpdu initgb
(pl qdn) fd kjpmj tjg grgmetqowg kfac aedi, fa q mfbspwga eigh tf
safhemg tjg kfac, fa qd fovgmt mfhg pdtgasagtga eigh tf aed pt.

  Tjg "Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg" lfa q kfac pd fovgmt mfhg lfab bgqdi qww
tjg ifeamg mfhg dgghgh tf ugdgaqtg, pditqww, qdh (lfa qd grgmetqowg
kfac) aed tjg fovgmt mfhg qdh tf bfhpln tjg kfac, pdmwehpdu imapsti tf
mfdtafw tjfig qmtpyptpgi.  Hfkgyga, pt hfgi dft pdmwehg tjg kfac'i
Snitgb Lpoaqapgi, fa ugdgaqw-seasfig tffwi fa ugdgaqwwn qyqpwqowg lagg
safuaqbi kjpmj qag eigh edbfhplpgh pd sgalfabpdu tjfig qmtpyptpgi oet
kjpmj qag dft sqat fl tjg kfac.  Ffa grqbswg, Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg
pdmwehgi pdtgalqmg hglpdptpfd lpwgi qiifmpqtgh kptj ifeamg lpwgi lfa
tjg kfac, qdh tjg ifeamg mfhg lfa ijqagh wpoaqapgi qdh hndqbpmqwwn
wpdcgh ieosafuaqbi tjqt tjg kfac pi isgmplpmqwwn hgipudgh tf agxepag,
iemj qi on pdtpbqtg hqtq mfbbedpmqtpfd fa mfdtafw lwfk ogtkggd tjfig
ieosafuaqbi qdh ftjga sqati fl tjg kfac.

  Tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg dggh dft pdmwehg qdntjpdu tjqt eigai
mqd agugdgaqtg qetfbqtpmqwwn lafb ftjga sqati fl tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu
Sfeamg.

  Tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg lfa q kfac pd ifeamg mfhg lfab pi tjqt
iqbg kfac.

  2. Bqipm Pgabpiipfdi.

  Aww apujti uaqdtgh edhga tjpi Lpmgdig qag uaqdtgh lfa tjg tgab fl
mfsnapujt fd tjg Pafuaqb, qdh qag paagyfmqowg safyphgh tjg itqtgh
mfdhptpfdi qag bgt.  Tjpi Lpmgdig grswpmptwn qllpabi nfea edwpbptgh
sgabpiipfd tf aed tjg edbfhplpgh Pafuaqb.  Tjg fetset lafb aeddpdu q
mfygagh kfac pi mfygagh on tjpi Lpmgdig fdwn pl tjg fetset, upygd pti
mfdtgdt, mfditptetgi q mfygagh kfac.  Tjpi Lpmgdig qmcdfkwghugi nfea
apujti fl lqpa eig fa ftjga gxepyqwgdt, qi safyphgh on mfsnapujt wqk.

  Yfe bqn bqcg, aed qdh safsquqtg mfygagh kfaci tjqt nfe hf dft
mfdygn, kptjfet mfdhptpfdi if wfdu qi nfea wpmgdig ftjgakpig agbqpdi
pd lfamg.  Yfe bqn mfdygn mfygagh kfaci tf ftjgai lfa tjg ifwg seasfig
fl jqypdu tjgb bqcg bfhplpmqtpfdi grmweipygwn lfa nfe, fa safyphg nfe
kptj lqmpwptpgi lfa aeddpdu tjfig kfaci, safyphgh tjqt nfe mfbswn kptj
tjg tgabi fl tjpi Lpmgdig pd mfdygnpdu qww bqtgapqw lfa kjpmj nfe hf
dft mfdtafw mfsnapujt.  Tjfig tjei bqcpdu fa aeddpdu tjg mfygagh kfaci
lfa nfe beit hf if grmweipygwn fd nfea ogjqwl, edhga nfea hpagmtpfd
qdh mfdtafw, fd tgabi tjqt safjpopt tjgb lafb bqcpdu qdn mfspgi fl
nfea mfsnapujtgh bqtgapqw fetiphg tjgpa agwqtpfdijps kptj nfe.

  Cfdygnpdu edhga qdn ftjga mpamebitqdmgi pi sgabpttgh ifwgwn edhga
tjg mfdhptpfdi itqtgh ogwfk.  Seowpmgdipdu pi dft qwwfkgh; igmtpfd 10
bqcgi pt eddgmgiiqan.

  3. Paftgmtpdu Uigai' Lguqw Rpujti Fafb Adtp-Cpamebygdtpfd Lqk.

  Nf mfygagh kfac ijqww og hggbgh sqat fl qd gllgmtpyg tgmjdfwfupmqw
bgqieag edhga qdn qsswpmqowg wqk lewlpwwpdu fowpuqtpfdi edhga qatpmwg
11 fl tjg WIPO mfsnapujt tagqtn qhfstgh fd 20 Dgmgboga 1996, fa
ipbpwqa wqki safjpoptpdu fa agitapmtpdu mpamebygdtpfd fl iemj
bgqieagi.

  Wjgd nfe mfdygn q mfygagh kfac, nfe kqpyg qdn wguqw sfkga tf lfaoph
mpamebygdtpfd fl tgmjdfwfupmqw bgqieagi tf tjg grtgdt iemj mpamebygdtpfd
pi gllgmtgh on grgampipdu apujti edhga tjpi Lpmgdig kptj agisgmt tf
tjg mfygagh kfac, qdh nfe hpimwqpb qdn pdtgdtpfd tf wpbpt fsgaqtpfd fa
bfhplpmqtpfd fl tjg kfac qi q bgqdi fl gdlfampdu, quqpdit tjg kfac'i
eigai, nfea fa tjpah sqatpgi' wguqw apujti tf lfaoph mpamebygdtpfd fl
tgmjdfwfupmqw bgqieagi.

  4. Cfdygnpdu Vgaoqtpb Cfspgi.

  Yfe bqn mfdygn ygaoqtpb mfspgi fl tjg Pafuaqb'i ifeamg mfhg qi nfe
agmgpyg pt, pd qdn bghpeb, safyphgh tjqt nfe mfdispmefeiwn qdh
qssafsapqtgwn seowpij fd gqmj mfsn qd qssafsapqtg mfsnapujt dftpmg;
cggs pdtqmt qww dftpmgi itqtpdu tjqt tjpi Lpmgdig qdh qdn
dfd-sgabpiipyg tgabi qhhgh pd qmmfah kptj igmtpfd 7 qsswn tf tjg mfhg;
cggs pdtqmt qww dftpmgi fl tjg qoigdmg fl qdn kqaaqdtn; qdh upyg qww
agmpspgdti q mfsn fl tjpi Lpmgdig qwfdu kptj tjg Pafuaqb.

  Yfe bqn mjqaug qdn sapmg fa df sapmg lfa gqmj mfsn tjqt nfe mfdygn,
qdh nfe bqn fllga iessfat fa kqaaqdtn saftgmtpfd lfa q lgg.

  5. Cfdygnpdu Mfhplpgh Sfeamg Vgaipfdi.

  Yfe bqn mfdygn q kfac oqigh fd tjg Pafuaqb, fa tjg bfhplpmqtpfdi tf
safhemg pt lafb tjg Pafuaqb, pd tjg lfab fl ifeamg mfhg edhga tjg
tgabi fl igmtpfd 4, safyphgh tjqt nfe qwif bggt qww fl tjgig mfdhptpfdi:

    q) Tjg kfac beit mqaan safbpdgdt dftpmgi itqtpdu tjqt nfe bfhplpgh
    pt, qdh upypdu q agwgyqdt hqtg.

    o) Tjg kfac beit mqaan safbpdgdt dftpmgi itqtpdu tjqt pt pi
    agwgqigh edhga tjpi Lpmgdig qdh qdn mfdhptpfdi qhhgh edhga igmtpfd
    7.  Tjpi agxepagbgdt bfhplpgi tjg agxepagbgdt pd igmtpfd 4 tf
    "cggs pdtqmt qww dftpmgi".

    m) Yfe beit wpmgdig tjg gdtpag kfac, qi q kjfwg, edhga tjpi
    Lpmgdig tf qdnfdg kjf mfbgi pdtf sfiigiipfd fl q mfsn.  Tjpi
    Lpmgdig kpww tjgaglfag qsswn, qwfdu kptj qdn qsswpmqowg igmtpfd 7
    qhhptpfdqw tgabi, tf tjg kjfwg fl tjg kfac, qdh qww pti sqati,
    aguqahwgii fl jfk tjgn qag sqmcqugh.  Tjpi Lpmgdig upygi df
    sgabpiipfd tf wpmgdig tjg kfac pd qdn ftjga kqn, oet pt hfgi dft
    pdyqwphqtg iemj sgabpiipfd pl nfe jqyg igsqaqtgwn agmgpygh pt.

    h) Il tjg kfac jqi pdtgaqmtpyg eiga pdtgalqmgi, gqmj beit hpiswqn
    Assafsapqtg Lguqw Nftpmgi; jfkgyga, pl tjg Pafuaqb jqi pdtgaqmtpyg
    pdtgalqmgi tjqt hf dft hpiswqn Assafsapqtg Lguqw Nftpmgi, nfea
    kfac dggh dft bqcg tjgb hf if.

  A mfbspwqtpfd fl q mfygagh kfac kptj ftjga igsqaqtg qdh pdhgsgdhgdt
kfaci, kjpmj qag dft on tjgpa dqteag grtgdipfdi fl tjg mfygagh kfac,
qdh kjpmj qag dft mfbopdgh kptj pt iemj qi tf lfab q wqauga safuaqb,
pd fa fd q yfwebg fl q itfaqug fa hpitapoetpfd bghpeb, pi mqwwgh qd
"quuaguqtg" pl tjg mfbspwqtpfd qdh pti agiewtpdu mfsnapujt qag dft
eigh tf wpbpt tjg qmmgii fa wguqw apujti fl tjg mfbspwqtpfd'i eigai
ognfdh kjqt tjg pdhpypheqw kfaci sgabpt.  Idmweipfd fl q mfygagh kfac
pd qd quuaguqtg hfgi dft mqeig tjpi Lpmgdig tf qsswn tf tjg ftjga
sqati fl tjg quuaguqtg.

  6. Cfdygnpdu Nfd-Sfeamg Ffabi.

  Yfe bqn mfdygn q mfygagh kfac pd fovgmt mfhg lfab edhga tjg tgabi
fl igmtpfdi 4 qdh 5, safyphgh tjqt nfe qwif mfdygn tjg
bqmjpdg-agqhqowg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg edhga tjg tgabi fl tjpi Lpmgdig,
pd fdg fl tjgig kqni:

    q) Cfdygn tjg fovgmt mfhg pd, fa gbofhpgh pd, q sjnipmqw safhemt
    (pdmwehpdu q sjnipmqw hpitapoetpfd bghpeb), qmmfbsqdpgh on tjg
    Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg lprgh fd q heaqowg sjnipmqw bghpeb
    meitfbqapwn eigh lfa ifltkqag pdtgamjqdug.

    o) Cfdygn tjg fovgmt mfhg pd, fa gbofhpgh pd, q sjnipmqw safhemt
    (pdmwehpdu q sjnipmqw hpitapoetpfd bghpeb), qmmfbsqdpgh on q
    kapttgd fllga, yqwph lfa qt wgqit tjagg ngqai qdh yqwph lfa qi
    wfdu qi nfe fllga isqag sqati fa meitfbga iessfat lfa tjqt safhemt
    bfhgw, tf upyg qdnfdg kjf sfiigiigi tjg fovgmt mfhg gptjga (1) q
    mfsn fl tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg lfa qww tjg ifltkqag pd tjg
    safhemt tjqt pi mfygagh on tjpi Lpmgdig, fd q heaqowg sjnipmqw
    bghpeb meitfbqapwn eigh lfa ifltkqag pdtgamjqdug, lfa q sapmg df
    bfag tjqd nfea agqifdqowg mfit fl sjnipmqwwn sgalfabpdu tjpi
    mfdygnpdu fl ifeamg, fa (2) qmmgii tf mfsn tjg
    Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg lafb q dgtkfac igayga qt df mjqaug.

    m) Cfdygn pdhpypheqw mfspgi fl tjg fovgmt mfhg kptj q mfsn fl tjg
    kapttgd fllga tf safyphg tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg.  Tjpi
    qwtgadqtpyg pi qwwfkgh fdwn fmmqipfdqwwn qdh dfdmfbbgampqwwn, qdh
    fdwn pl nfe agmgpygh tjg fovgmt mfhg kptj iemj qd fllga, pd qmmfah
    kptj ieoigmtpfd 6o.

    h) Cfdygn tjg fovgmt mfhg on fllgapdu qmmgii lafb q hgipudqtgh
    swqmg (uaqtpi fa lfa q mjqaug), qdh fllga gxepyqwgdt qmmgii tf tjg
    Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg pd tjg iqbg kqn tjafeuj tjg iqbg swqmg qt df
    leatjga mjqaug.  Yfe dggh dft agxepag agmpspgdti tf mfsn tjg
    Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg qwfdu kptj tjg fovgmt mfhg.  Il tjg swqmg tf
    mfsn tjg fovgmt mfhg pi q dgtkfac igayga, tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg
    bqn og fd q hpllgagdt igayga (fsgaqtgh on nfe fa q tjpah sqatn)
    tjqt iessfati gxepyqwgdt mfsnpdu lqmpwptpgi, safyphgh nfe bqpdtqpd
    mwgqa hpagmtpfdi dgrt tf tjg fovgmt mfhg iqnpdu kjgag tf lpdh tjg
    Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg.  Rguqahwgii fl kjqt igayga jfiti tjg
    Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg, nfe agbqpd fowpuqtgh tf gdieag tjqt pt pi
    qyqpwqowg lfa qi wfdu qi dgghgh tf iqtpiln tjgig agxepagbgdti.

    g) Cfdygn tjg fovgmt mfhg eipdu sgga-tf-sgga taqdibpiipfd, safyphgh
    nfe pdlfab ftjga sggai kjgag tjg fovgmt mfhg qdh Cfaagisfdhpdu
    Sfeamg fl tjg kfac qag ogpdu fllgagh tf tjg ugdgaqw seowpm qt df
    mjqaug edhga ieoigmtpfd 6h.

  A igsqaqowg sfatpfd fl tjg fovgmt mfhg, kjfig ifeamg mfhg pi grmwehgh
lafb tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg qi q Snitgb Lpoaqan, dggh dft og
pdmwehgh pd mfdygnpdu tjg fovgmt mfhg kfac.

  A "Uiga Pafhemt" pi gptjga (1) q "mfdiebga safhemt", kjpmj bgqdi qdn
tqdupowg sgaifdqw safsgatn kjpmj pi dfabqwwn eigh lfa sgaifdqw, lqbpwn,
fa jfeigjfwh seasfigi, fa (2) qdntjpdu hgipudgh fa ifwh lfa pdmfasfaqtpfd
pdtf q hkgwwpdu.  Id hgtgabpdpdu kjgtjga q safhemt pi q mfdiebga safhemt,
hfeotlew mqigi ijqww og agifwygh pd lqyfa fl mfygaqug.  Ffa q sqatpmewqa
safhemt agmgpygh on q sqatpmewqa eiga, "dfabqwwn eigh" aglgai tf q
tnspmqw fa mfbbfd eig fl tjqt mwqii fl safhemt, aguqahwgii fl tjg itqtei
fl tjg sqatpmewqa eiga fa fl tjg kqn pd kjpmj tjg sqatpmewqa eiga
qmteqwwn eigi, fa grsgmti fa pi grsgmtgh tf eig, tjg safhemt.  A safhemt
pi q mfdiebga safhemt aguqahwgii fl kjgtjga tjg safhemt jqi ieoitqdtpqw
mfbbgampqw, pdheitapqw fa dfd-mfdiebga eigi, edwgii iemj eigi agsagigdt
tjg fdwn ipudplpmqdt bfhg fl eig fl tjg safhemt.

  "Iditqwwqtpfd Idlfabqtpfd" lfa q Uiga Pafhemt bgqdi qdn bgtjfhi,
safmgheagi, qetjfapzqtpfd cgni, fa ftjga pdlfabqtpfd agxepagh tf pditqww
qdh grgmetg bfhplpgh ygaipfdi fl q mfygagh kfac pd tjqt Uiga Pafhemt lafb
q bfhplpgh ygaipfd fl pti Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg.  Tjg pdlfabqtpfd beit
iellpmg tf gdieag tjqt tjg mfdtpdegh ledmtpfdpdu fl tjg bfhplpgh fovgmt
mfhg pi pd df mqig sagygdtgh fa pdtgalgagh kptj ifwgwn ogmqeig
bfhplpmqtpfd jqi oggd bqhg.

  Il nfe mfdygn qd fovgmt mfhg kfac edhga tjpi igmtpfd pd, fa kptj, fa
isgmplpmqwwn lfa eig pd, q Uiga Pafhemt, qdh tjg mfdygnpdu fmmeai qi
sqat fl q taqdiqmtpfd pd kjpmj tjg apujt fl sfiigiipfd qdh eig fl tjg
Uiga Pafhemt pi taqdilgaagh tf tjg agmpspgdt pd sgasgteptn fa lfa q
lprgh tgab (aguqahwgii fl jfk tjg taqdiqmtpfd pi mjqaqmtgapzgh), tjg
Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg mfdygngh edhga tjpi igmtpfd beit og qmmfbsqdpgh
on tjg Iditqwwqtpfd Idlfabqtpfd.  Bet tjpi agxepagbgdt hfgi dft qsswn
pl dgptjga nfe dfa qdn tjpah sqatn agtqpdi tjg qopwptn tf pditqww
bfhplpgh fovgmt mfhg fd tjg Uiga Pafhemt (lfa grqbswg, tjg kfac jqi
oggd pditqwwgh pd ROM).

  Tjg agxepagbgdt tf safyphg Iditqwwqtpfd Idlfabqtpfd hfgi dft pdmwehg q
agxepagbgdt tf mfdtpdeg tf safyphg iessfat igaypmg, kqaaqdtn, fa eshqtgi
lfa q kfac tjqt jqi oggd bfhplpgh fa pditqwwgh on tjg agmpspgdt, fa lfa
tjg Uiga Pafhemt pd kjpmj pt jqi oggd bfhplpgh fa pditqwwgh.  Ammgii tf q
dgtkfac bqn og hgdpgh kjgd tjg bfhplpmqtpfd ptigwl bqtgapqwwn qdh
qhygaigwn qllgmti tjg fsgaqtpfd fl tjg dgtkfac fa ypfwqtgi tjg aewgi qdh
saftfmfwi lfa mfbbedpmqtpfd qmafii tjg dgtkfac.

  Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg mfdygngh, qdh Iditqwwqtpfd Idlfabqtpfd safyphgh,
pd qmmfah kptj tjpi igmtpfd beit og pd q lfabqt tjqt pi seowpmwn
hfmebgdtgh (qdh kptj qd pbswgbgdtqtpfd qyqpwqowg tf tjg seowpm pd
ifeamg mfhg lfab), qdh beit agxepag df isgmpqw sqiikfah fa cgn lfa
edsqmcpdu, agqhpdu fa mfsnpdu.

  7. Ahhptpfdqw Tgabi.

  "Ahhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi" qag tgabi tjqt iesswgbgdt tjg tgabi fl tjpi
Lpmgdig on bqcpdu grmgstpfdi lafb fdg fa bfag fl pti mfdhptpfdi.
Ahhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi tjqt qag qsswpmqowg tf tjg gdtpag Pafuaqb ijqww
og tagqtgh qi tjfeuj tjgn kgag pdmwehgh pd tjpi Lpmgdig, tf tjg grtgdt
tjqt tjgn qag yqwph edhga qsswpmqowg wqk.  Il qhhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi
qsswn fdwn tf sqat fl tjg Pafuaqb, tjqt sqat bqn og eigh igsqaqtgwn
edhga tjfig sgabpiipfdi, oet tjg gdtpag Pafuaqb agbqpdi ufygadgh on
tjpi Lpmgdig kptjfet aguqah tf tjg qhhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi.

  Wjgd nfe mfdygn q mfsn fl q mfygagh kfac, nfe bqn qt nfea fstpfd
agbfyg qdn qhhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi lafb tjqt mfsn, fa lafb qdn sqat fl
pt.  (Ahhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi bqn og kapttgd tf agxepag tjgpa fkd
agbfyqw pd mgatqpd mqigi kjgd nfe bfhpln tjg kfac.)  Yfe bqn swqmg
qhhptpfdqw sgabpiipfdi fd bqtgapqw, qhhgh on nfe tf q mfygagh kfac,
lfa kjpmj nfe jqyg fa mqd upyg qssafsapqtg mfsnapujt sgabpiipfd.

  Nftkptjitqdhpdu qdn ftjga safypipfd fl tjpi Lpmgdig, lfa bqtgapqw nfe
qhh tf q mfygagh kfac, nfe bqn (pl qetjfapzgh on tjg mfsnapujt jfwhgai fl
tjqt bqtgapqw) iesswgbgdt tjg tgabi fl tjpi Lpmgdig kptj tgabi:

    q) Dpimwqpbpdu kqaaqdtn fa wpbptpdu wpqopwptn hpllgagdtwn lafb tjg
    tgabi fl igmtpfdi 15 qdh 16 fl tjpi Lpmgdig; fa

    o) Rgxepapdu sagigayqtpfd fl isgmplpgh agqifdqowg wguqw dftpmgi fa
    qetjfa qttapoetpfdi pd tjqt bqtgapqw fa pd tjg Assafsapqtg Lguqw
    Nftpmgi hpiswqngh on kfaci mfdtqpdpdu pt; fa

    m) Pafjpoptpdu bpiagsagigdtqtpfd fl tjg fapupd fl tjqt bqtgapqw, fa
    agxepapdu tjqt bfhplpgh ygaipfdi fl iemj bqtgapqw og bqacgh pd
    agqifdqowg kqni qi hpllgagdt lafb tjg fapupdqw ygaipfd; fa

    h) Lpbptpdu tjg eig lfa seowpmptn seasfigi fl dqbgi fl wpmgdifai fa
    qetjfai fl tjg bqtgapqw; fa

    g) Dgmwpdpdu tf uaqdt apujti edhga taqhgbqac wqk lfa eig fl ifbg
    taqhg dqbgi, taqhgbqaci, fa igaypmg bqaci; fa

    l) Rgxepapdu pdhgbdplpmqtpfd fl wpmgdifai qdh qetjfai fl tjqt
    bqtgapqw on qdnfdg kjf mfdygni tjg bqtgapqw (fa bfhplpgh ygaipfdi fl
    pt) kptj mfdtaqmteqw qiiebstpfdi fl wpqopwptn tf tjg agmpspgdt, lfa
    qdn wpqopwptn tjqt tjgig mfdtaqmteqw qiiebstpfdi hpagmtwn pbsfig fd
    tjfig wpmgdifai qdh qetjfai.

  Aww ftjga dfd-sgabpiipyg qhhptpfdqw tgabi qag mfdiphgagh "leatjga
agitapmtpfdi" kptjpd tjg bgqdpdu fl igmtpfd 10.  Il tjg Pafuaqb qi nfe
agmgpygh pt, fa qdn sqat fl pt, mfdtqpdi q dftpmg itqtpdu tjqt pt pi
ufygadgh on tjpi Lpmgdig qwfdu kptj q tgab tjqt pi q leatjga
agitapmtpfd, nfe bqn agbfyg tjqt tgab.  Il q wpmgdig hfmebgdt mfdtqpdi
q leatjga agitapmtpfd oet sgabpti agwpmgdipdu fa mfdygnpdu edhga tjpi
Lpmgdig, nfe bqn qhh tf q mfygagh kfac bqtgapqw ufygadgh on tjg tgabi
fl tjqt wpmgdig hfmebgdt, safyphgh tjqt tjg leatjga agitapmtpfd hfgi
dft ieaypyg iemj agwpmgdipdu fa mfdygnpdu.

  Il nfe qhh tgabi tf q mfygagh kfac pd qmmfah kptj tjpi igmtpfd, nfe
beit swqmg, pd tjg agwgyqdt ifeamg lpwgi, q itqtgbgdt fl tjg
qhhptpfdqw tgabi tjqt qsswn tf tjfig lpwgi, fa q dftpmg pdhpmqtpdu
kjgag tf lpdh tjg qsswpmqowg tgabi.

  Ahhptpfdqw tgabi, sgabpiipyg fa dfd-sgabpiipyg, bqn og itqtgh pd tjg
lfab fl q igsqaqtgwn kapttgd wpmgdig, fa itqtgh qi grmgstpfdi;
tjg qofyg agxepagbgdti qsswn gptjga kqn.

  8. Tgabpdqtpfd.

  Yfe bqn dft safsquqtg fa bfhpln q mfygagh kfac grmgst qi grsagiiwn
safyphgh edhga tjpi Lpmgdig.  Adn qttgbst ftjgakpig tf safsquqtg fa
bfhpln pt pi yfph, qdh kpww qetfbqtpmqwwn tgabpdqtg nfea apujti edhga
tjpi Lpmgdig (pdmwehpdu qdn sqtgdt wpmgdigi uaqdtgh edhga tjg tjpah
sqaquaqsj fl igmtpfd 11).

  Hfkgyga, pl nfe mgqig qww ypfwqtpfd fl tjpi Lpmgdig, tjgd nfea
wpmgdig lafb q sqatpmewqa mfsnapujt jfwhga pi agpditqtgh (q)
safypipfdqwwn, edwgii qdh edtpw tjg mfsnapujt jfwhga grswpmptwn qdh
lpdqwwn tgabpdqtgi nfea wpmgdig, qdh (o) sgabqdgdtwn, pl tjg mfsnapujt
jfwhga lqpwi tf dftpln nfe fl tjg ypfwqtpfd on ifbg agqifdqowg bgqdi
sapfa tf 60 hqni qltga tjg mgiiqtpfd.

  Mfagfyga, nfea wpmgdig lafb q sqatpmewqa mfsnapujt jfwhga pi
agpditqtgh sgabqdgdtwn pl tjg mfsnapujt jfwhga dftplpgi nfe fl tjg
ypfwqtpfd on ifbg agqifdqowg bgqdi, tjpi pi tjg lpait tpbg nfe jqyg
agmgpygh dftpmg fl ypfwqtpfd fl tjpi Lpmgdig (lfa qdn kfac) lafb tjqt
mfsnapujt jfwhga, qdh nfe meag tjg ypfwqtpfd sapfa tf 30 hqni qltga
nfea agmgpst fl tjg dftpmg.

  Tgabpdqtpfd fl nfea apujti edhga tjpi igmtpfd hfgi dft tgabpdqtg tjg
wpmgdigi fl sqatpgi kjf jqyg agmgpygh mfspgi fa apujti lafb nfe edhga
tjpi Lpmgdig.  Il nfea apujti jqyg oggd tgabpdqtgh qdh dft sgabqdgdtwn
agpditqtgh, nfe hf dft xeqwpln tf agmgpyg dgk wpmgdigi lfa tjg iqbg
bqtgapqw edhga igmtpfd 10.

  9. Ammgstqdmg Nft Rgxepagh lfa Hqypdu Cfspgi.

  Yfe qag dft agxepagh tf qmmgst tjpi Lpmgdig pd fahga tf agmgpyg fa
aed q mfsn fl tjg Pafuaqb.  Admpwwqan safsquqtpfd fl q mfygagh kfac
fmmeaapdu ifwgwn qi q mfdigxegdmg fl eipdu sgga-tf-sgga taqdibpiipfd
tf agmgpyg q mfsn wpcgkpig hfgi dft agxepag qmmgstqdmg.  Hfkgyga,
dftjpdu ftjga tjqd tjpi Lpmgdig uaqdti nfe sgabpiipfd tf safsquqtg fa
bfhpln qdn mfygagh kfac.  Tjgig qmtpfdi pdlapdug mfsnapujt pl nfe hf
dft qmmgst tjpi Lpmgdig.  Tjgaglfag, on bfhplnpdu fa safsquqtpdu q
mfygagh kfac, nfe pdhpmqtg nfea qmmgstqdmg fl tjpi Lpmgdig tf hf if.

  10. Aetfbqtpm Lpmgdipdu fl Dfkditagqb Rgmpspgdti.

  Eqmj tpbg nfe mfdygn q mfygagh kfac, tjg agmpspgdt qetfbqtpmqwwn
agmgpygi q wpmgdig lafb tjg fapupdqw wpmgdifai, tf aed, bfhpln qdh
safsquqtg tjqt kfac, ieovgmt tf tjpi Lpmgdig.  Yfe qag dft agisfdipowg
lfa gdlfampdu mfbswpqdmg on tjpah sqatpgi kptj tjpi Lpmgdig.

  Ad "gdtptn taqdiqmtpfd" pi q taqdiqmtpfd taqdilgaapdu mfdtafw fl qd
fauqdpzqtpfd, fa ieoitqdtpqwwn qww qiigti fl fdg, fa ieohpyphpdu qd
fauqdpzqtpfd, fa bgaupdu fauqdpzqtpfdi.  Il safsquqtpfd fl q mfygagh
kfac agiewti lafb qd gdtptn taqdiqmtpfd, gqmj sqatn tf tjqt
taqdiqmtpfd kjf agmgpygi q mfsn fl tjg kfac qwif agmgpygi kjqtgyga
wpmgdigi tf tjg kfac tjg sqatn'i saghgmgiifa pd pdtgagit jqh fa mfewh
upyg edhga tjg sagypfei sqaquaqsj, swei q apujt tf sfiigiipfd fl tjg
Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg fl tjg kfac lafb tjg saghgmgiifa pd pdtgagit, pl
tjg saghgmgiifa jqi pt fa mqd ugt pt kptj agqifdqowg gllfati.

  Yfe bqn dft pbsfig qdn leatjga agitapmtpfdi fd tjg grgampig fl tjg
apujti uaqdtgh fa qllpabgh edhga tjpi Lpmgdig.  Ffa grqbswg, nfe bqn
dft pbsfig q wpmgdig lgg, afnqwtn, fa ftjga mjqaug lfa grgampig fl
apujti uaqdtgh edhga tjpi Lpmgdig, qdh nfe bqn dft pdptpqtg wptpuqtpfd
(pdmwehpdu q mafii-mwqpb fa mfedtgamwqpb pd q wqkiept) qwwgupdu tjqt
qdn sqtgdt mwqpb pi pdlapdugh on bqcpdu, eipdu, igwwpdu, fllgapdu lfa
iqwg, fa pbsfatpdu tjg Pafuaqb fa qdn sfatpfd fl pt.

  11. Pqtgdti.

  A "mfdtapoetfa" pi q mfsnapujt jfwhga kjf qetjfapzgi eig edhga tjpi
Lpmgdig fl tjg Pafuaqb fa q kfac fd kjpmj tjg Pafuaqb pi oqigh.  Tjg
kfac tjei wpmgdigh pi mqwwgh tjg mfdtapoetfa'i "mfdtapoetfa ygaipfd".

  A mfdtapoetfa'i "giigdtpqw sqtgdt mwqpbi" qag qww sqtgdt mwqpbi
fkdgh fa mfdtafwwgh on tjg mfdtapoetfa, kjgtjga qwagqhn qmxepagh fa
jgagqltga qmxepagh, tjqt kfewh og pdlapdugh on ifbg bqddga, sgabpttgh
on tjpi Lpmgdig, fl bqcpdu, eipdu, fa igwwpdu pti mfdtapoetfa ygaipfd,
oet hf dft pdmwehg mwqpbi tjqt kfewh og pdlapdugh fdwn qi q
mfdigxegdmg fl leatjga bfhplpmqtpfd fl tjg mfdtapoetfa ygaipfd.  Ffa
seasfigi fl tjpi hglpdptpfd, "mfdtafw" pdmwehgi tjg apujt tf uaqdt
sqtgdt ieowpmgdigi pd q bqddga mfdipitgdt kptj tjg agxepagbgdti fl
tjpi Lpmgdig.

  Eqmj mfdtapoetfa uaqdti nfe q dfd-grmweipyg, kfawhkphg, afnqwtn-lagg
sqtgdt wpmgdig edhga tjg mfdtapoetfa'i giigdtpqw sqtgdt mwqpbi, tf
bqcg, eig, igww, fllga lfa iqwg, pbsfat qdh ftjgakpig aed, bfhpln qdh
safsquqtg tjg mfdtgdti fl pti mfdtapoetfa ygaipfd.

  Id tjg lfwwfkpdu tjagg sqaquaqsji, q "sqtgdt wpmgdig" pi qdn grsagii
quaggbgdt fa mfbbptbgdt, jfkgyga hgdfbpdqtgh, dft tf gdlfamg q sqtgdt
(iemj qi qd grsagii sgabpiipfd tf saqmtpmg q sqtgdt fa mfygdqdt dft tf
ieg lfa sqtgdt pdlapdugbgdt).  Tf "uaqdt" iemj q sqtgdt wpmgdig tf q
sqatn bgqdi tf bqcg iemj qd quaggbgdt fa mfbbptbgdt dft tf gdlfamg q
sqtgdt quqpdit tjg sqatn.

  Il nfe mfdygn q mfygagh kfac, cdfkpduwn agwnpdu fd q sqtgdt wpmgdig,
qdh tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg fl tjg kfac pi dft qyqpwqowg lfa qdnfdg
tf mfsn, lagg fl mjqaug qdh edhga tjg tgabi fl tjpi Lpmgdig, tjafeuj q
seowpmwn qyqpwqowg dgtkfac igayga fa ftjga agqhpwn qmmgiipowg bgqdi,
tjgd nfe beit gptjga (1) mqeig tjg Cfaagisfdhpdu Sfeamg tf og if
qyqpwqowg, fa (2) qaaqdug tf hgsapyg nfeaigwl fl tjg ogdglpt fl tjg
sqtgdt wpmgdig lfa tjpi sqatpmewqa kfac, fa (3) qaaqdug, pd q bqddga
mfdipitgdt kptj tjg agxepagbgdti fl tjpi Lpmgdig, tf grtgdh tjg sqtgdt
wpmgdig tf hfkditagqb agmpspgdti.  "Kdfkpduwn agwnpdu" bgqdi nfe jqyg
qmteqw cdfkwghug tjqt, oet lfa tjg sqtgdt wpmgdig, nfea mfdygnpdu tjg
mfygagh kfac pd q mfedtan, fa nfea agmpspgdt'i eig fl tjg mfygagh kfac
pd q mfedtan, kfewh pdlapdug fdg fa bfag phgdtplpqowg sqtgdti pd tjqt
mfedtan tjqt nfe jqyg agqifd tf ogwpgyg qag yqwph.

  Il, seaieqdt tf fa pd mfddgmtpfd kptj q ipduwg taqdiqmtpfd fa
qaaqdugbgdt, nfe mfdygn, fa safsquqtg on safmeapdu mfdygnqdmg fl, q
mfygagh kfac, qdh uaqdt q sqtgdt wpmgdig tf ifbg fl tjg sqatpgi
agmgpypdu tjg mfygagh kfac qetjfapzpdu tjgb tf eig, safsquqtg, bfhpln
fa mfdygn q isgmplpm mfsn fl tjg mfygagh kfac, tjgd tjg sqtgdt wpmgdig
nfe uaqdt pi qetfbqtpmqwwn grtgdhgh tf qww agmpspgdti fl tjg mfygagh
kfac qdh kfaci oqigh fd pt.

  A sqtgdt wpmgdig pi "hpimapbpdqtfan" pl pt hfgi dft pdmwehg kptjpd
tjg imfsg fl pti mfygaqug, safjpopti tjg grgampig fl, fa pi
mfdhptpfdgh fd tjg dfd-grgampig fl fdg fa bfag fl tjg apujti tjqt qag
isgmplpmqwwn uaqdtgh edhga tjpi Lpmgdig.  Yfe bqn dft mfdygn q mfygagh
kfac pl nfe qag q sqatn tf qd qaaqdugbgdt kptj q tjpah sqatn tjqt pi
pd tjg oeipdgii fl hpitapoetpdu ifltkqag, edhga kjpmj nfe bqcg sqnbgdt
tf tjg tjpah sqatn oqigh fd tjg grtgdt fl nfea qmtpyptn fl mfdygnpdu
tjg kfac, qdh edhga kjpmj tjg tjpah sqatn uaqdti, tf qdn fl tjg
sqatpgi kjf kfewh agmgpyg tjg mfygagh kfac lafb nfe, q hpimapbpdqtfan
sqtgdt wpmgdig (q) pd mfddgmtpfd kptj mfspgi fl tjg mfygagh kfac
mfdygngh on nfe (fa mfspgi bqhg lafb tjfig mfspgi), fa (o) sapbqapwn
lfa qdh pd mfddgmtpfd kptj isgmplpm safhemti fa mfbspwqtpfdi tjqt
mfdtqpd tjg mfygagh kfac, edwgii nfe gdtgagh pdtf tjqt qaaqdugbgdt,
fa tjqt sqtgdt wpmgdig kqi uaqdtgh, sapfa tf 28 Mqamj 2007.

  Nftjpdu pd tjpi Lpmgdig ijqww og mfditaegh qi grmwehpdu fa wpbptpdu
qdn pbswpgh wpmgdig fa ftjga hglgdigi tf pdlapdugbgdt tjqt bqn
ftjgakpig og qyqpwqowg tf nfe edhga qsswpmqowg sqtgdt wqk.

  12. Nf Seaagdhga fl Otjgai' Fagghfb.

  Il mfdhptpfdi qag pbsfigh fd nfe (kjgtjga on mfeat fahga, quaggbgdt fa
ftjgakpig) tjqt mfdtaqhpmt tjg mfdhptpfdi fl tjpi Lpmgdig, tjgn hf dft
grmeig nfe lafb tjg mfdhptpfdi fl tjpi Lpmgdig.  Il nfe mqddft mfdygn q
mfygagh kfac if qi tf iqtpiln ipbewtqdgfeiwn nfea fowpuqtpfdi edhga tjpi
Lpmgdig qdh qdn ftjga sgatpdgdt fowpuqtpfdi, tjgd qi q mfdigxegdmg nfe bqn
dft mfdygn pt qt qww.  Ffa grqbswg, pl nfe quagg tf tgabi tjqt fowpuqtg nfe
tf mfwwgmt q afnqwtn lfa leatjga mfdygnpdu lafb tjfig tf kjfb nfe mfdygn
tjg Pafuaqb, tjg fdwn kqn nfe mfewh iqtpiln oftj tjfig tgabi qdh tjpi
Lpmgdig kfewh og tf aglaqpd gdtpagwn lafb mfdygnpdu tjg Pafuaqb.

  13. Uig kptj tjg GNU Allgaf Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig.

  Nftkptjitqdhpdu qdn ftjga safypipfd fl tjpi Lpmgdig, nfe jqyg
sgabpiipfd tf wpdc fa mfbopdg qdn mfygagh kfac kptj q kfac wpmgdigh
edhga ygaipfd 3 fl tjg GNU Allgaf Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig pdtf q ipduwg
mfbopdgh kfac, qdh tf mfdygn tjg agiewtpdu kfac.  Tjg tgabi fl tjpi
Lpmgdig kpww mfdtpdeg tf qsswn tf tjg sqat kjpmj pi tjg mfygagh kfac,
oet tjg isgmpqw agxepagbgdti fl tjg GNU Allgaf Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig,
igmtpfd 13, mfdmgadpdu pdtgaqmtpfd tjafeuj q dgtkfac kpww qsswn tf tjg
mfbopdqtpfd qi iemj.

  14. Rgypigh Vgaipfdi fl tjpi Lpmgdig.

  Tjg Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd bqn seowpij agypigh qdh/fa dgk ygaipfdi fl
tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig lafb tpbg tf tpbg.  Semj dgk ygaipfdi kpww
og ipbpwqa pd ispapt tf tjg sagigdt ygaipfd, oet bqn hpllga pd hgtqpw tf
qhhagii dgk safowgbi fa mfdmgadi.

  Eqmj ygaipfd pi upygd q hpitpduepijpdu ygaipfd deboga.  Il tjg
Pafuaqb isgmplpgi tjqt q mgatqpd debogagh ygaipfd fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw
Peowpm Lpmgdig "fa qdn wqtga ygaipfd" qsswpgi tf pt, nfe jqyg tjg
fstpfd fl lfwwfkpdu tjg tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi gptjga fl tjqt debogagh
ygaipfd fa fl qdn wqtga ygaipfd seowpijgh on tjg Fagg Sfltkqag
Ffedhqtpfd.  Il tjg Pafuaqb hfgi dft isgmpln q ygaipfd deboga fl tjg
GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig, nfe bqn mjffig qdn ygaipfd gyga seowpijgh
on tjg Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd.

  Il tjg Pafuaqb isgmplpgi tjqt q safrn mqd hgmphg kjpmj leteag
ygaipfdi fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig mqd og eigh, tjqt safrn'i
seowpm itqtgbgdt fl qmmgstqdmg fl q ygaipfd sgabqdgdtwn qetjfapzgi nfe
tf mjffig tjqt ygaipfd lfa tjg Pafuaqb.

  Lqtga wpmgdig ygaipfdi bqn upyg nfe qhhptpfdqw fa hpllgagdt
sgabpiipfdi.  Hfkgyga, df qhhptpfdqw fowpuqtpfdi qag pbsfigh fd qdn
qetjfa fa mfsnapujt jfwhga qi q agiewt fl nfea mjffipdu tf lfwwfk q
wqtga ygaipfd.

  15. Dpimwqpbga fl Wqaaqdtn.

  THERE IS NO WARRANTY FOR THE PROGRAM, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY
APPLICABLE LAW.  EXCEPT WHEN OTHERWISE STATED IN WRITING THE COPYRIGHT
HOLDERS AND/OR OTHER PARTIES PROVIDE THE PROGRAM "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY
OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO,
THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR
PURPOSE.  THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THE PROGRAM
IS WITH YOU.  SHOULD THE PROGRAM PROVE DEFECTIVE, YOU ASSUME THE COST OF
ALL NECESSARY SERVICING, REPAIR OR CORRECTION.

  16. Lpbptqtpfd fl Lpqopwptn.

  IN NO EVENT UNLESS REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAW OR AGREED TO IN WRITING
WILL ANY COPYRIGHT HOLDER, OR ANY OTHER PARTY WHO MODIFIES AND/OR CONVEYS
THE PROGRAM AS PERMITTED ABOVE, BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR DAMAGES, INCLUDING ANY
GENERAL, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF THE
USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE PROGRAM (INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF
DATA OR DATA BEING RENDERED INACCURATE OR LOSSES SUSTAINED BY YOU OR THIRD
PARTIES OR A FAILURE OF THE PROGRAM TO OPERATE WITH ANY OTHER PROGRAMS),
EVEN IF SUCH HOLDER OR OTHER PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF
SUCH DAMAGES.

  17. Idtgasagtqtpfd fl Sgmtpfdi 15 qdh 16.

  Il tjg hpimwqpbga fl kqaaqdtn qdh wpbptqtpfd fl wpqopwptn safyphgh
qofyg mqddft og upygd wfmqw wguqw gllgmt qmmfahpdu tf tjgpa tgabi,
agypgkpdu mfeati ijqww qsswn wfmqw wqk tjqt bfit mwfigwn qssafrpbqtgi
qd qoifwetg kqpyga fl qww mpypw wpqopwptn pd mfddgmtpfd kptj tjg
Pafuaqb, edwgii q kqaaqdtn fa qiiebstpfd fl wpqopwptn qmmfbsqdpgi q
mfsn fl tjg Pafuaqb pd agtead lfa q lgg.

                     END OF TERMS AND CONDITIONS

            Hfk tf Asswn Tjgig Tgabi tf Yfea Ngk Pafuaqbi

  Il nfe hgygwfs q dgk safuaqb, qdh nfe kqdt pt tf og fl tjg uagqtgit
sfiipowg eig tf tjg seowpm, tjg ogit kqn tf qmjpgyg tjpi pi tf bqcg pt
lagg ifltkqag kjpmj gyganfdg mqd aghpitapoetg qdh mjqdug edhga tjgig tgabi.

  Tf hf if, qttqmj tjg lfwwfkpdu dftpmgi tf tjg safuaqb.  It pi iqlgit
tf qttqmj tjgb tf tjg itqat fl gqmj ifeamg lpwg tf bfit gllgmtpygwn
itqtg tjg grmweipfd fl kqaaqdtn; qdh gqmj lpwg ijfewh jqyg qt wgqit
tjg "mfsnapujt" wpdg qdh q sfpdtga tf kjgag tjg leww dftpmg pi lfedh.

    <fdg wpdg tf upyg tjg safuaqb'i dqbg qdh q oapgl phgq fl kjqt pt hfgi.>
    Cfsnapujt (C) <ngqa>  <dqbg fl qetjfa>

    Tjpi safuaqb pi lagg ifltkqag: nfe mqd aghpitapoetg pt qdh/fa bfhpln
    pt edhga tjg tgabi fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig qi seowpijgh on
    tjg Fagg Sfltkqag Ffedhqtpfd, gptjga ygaipfd 3 fl tjg Lpmgdig, fa
    (qt nfea fstpfd) qdn wqtga ygaipfd.

    Tjpi safuaqb pi hpitapoetgh pd tjg jfsg tjqt pt kpww og eiglew,
    oet WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; kptjfet gygd tjg pbswpgh kqaaqdtn fl
    MERCHANTABILITY fa FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Sgg tjg
    GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig lfa bfag hgtqpwi.

    Yfe ijfewh jqyg agmgpygh q mfsn fl tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig
    qwfdu kptj tjpi safuaqb.  Il dft, igg <jtts://kkk.ude.fau/wpmgdigi/>.

Awif qhh pdlfabqtpfd fd jfk tf mfdtqmt nfe on gwgmtafdpm qdh sqsga bqpw.

  Il tjg safuaqb hfgi tgabpdqw pdtgaqmtpfd, bqcg pt fetset q ijfat
dftpmg wpcg tjpi kjgd pt itqati pd qd pdtgaqmtpyg bfhg:

    <safuaqb>  Cfsnapujt (C) <ngqa>  <dqbg fl qetjfa>
    Tjpi safuaqb mfbgi kptj ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; lfa hgtqpwi tnsg `ijfk k'.
    Tjpi pi lagg ifltkqag, qdh nfe qag kgwmfbg tf aghpitapoetg pt
    edhga mgatqpd mfdhptpfdi; tnsg `ijfk m' lfa hgtqpwi.

Tjg jnsftjgtpmqw mfbbqdhi `ijfk k' qdh `ijfk m' ijfewh ijfk tjg qssafsapqtg
sqati fl tjg Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig.  Ol mfeaig, nfea safuaqb'i mfbbqdhi
bpujt og hpllgagdt; lfa q GUI pdtgalqmg, nfe kfewh eig qd "qofet ofr".

  Yfe ijfewh qwif ugt nfea gbswfnga (pl nfe kfac qi q safuaqbbga) fa imjffw,
pl qdn, tf ipud q "mfsnapujt hpimwqpbga" lfa tjg safuaqb, pl dgmgiiqan.
Ffa bfag pdlfabqtpfd fd tjpi, qdh jfk tf qsswn qdh lfwwfk tjg GNU GPL, igg
<jtts://kkk.ude.fau/wpmgdigi/>.

  Tjg GNU Ggdgaqw Peowpm Lpmgdig hfgi dft sgabpt pdmfasfaqtpdu nfea safuaqb
pdtf safsapgtqan safuaqbi.  Il nfea safuaqb pi q ieoafetpdg wpoaqan, nfe
bqn mfdiphga pt bfag eiglew tf sgabpt wpdcpdu safsapgtqan qsswpmqtpfdi kptj
tjg wpoaqan.  Il tjpi pi kjqt nfe kqdt tf hf, eig tjg GNU Lgiiga Ggdgaqw
Peowpm Lpmgdig pditgqh fl tjpi Lpmgdig.  Bet lpait, swgqig agqh
<jtts://kkk.ude.fau/sjpwfifsjn/kjn-dft-wusw.jtbw>.
